values.value: Establish an incident response process that enables notification to the supervisory authority within 72 hours of becoming aware of a personal data breach. GDPR mandates prompt breach reporting with detailed information about the nature and scope of the breach.

Create a breach incident record type with fields for discovery timestamp, breach category, affected data subjects count, and DPA notification status. Build an escalation workflow that alerts the DPO and legal team immediately upon breach detection. Prepare a breach notification template aligned with supervisory authority requirements. Conduct tabletop exercises quarterly to test the 72-hour notification process end-to-end.
